description.brief: Targeted attacks focusing on accuracy, critical hits, and exploiting weaknesses
description.detailed: Precision Strikes represents the calculated approach to combat, where every attack is carefully planned and executed for maximum effectiveness. Practitioners study their enemies, identify weak points, and strike with surgical accuracy rather than brute force. This approach values patience, observation, and technical skill over raw aggression.
description.combat_philosophy: Victory through perfect knowledge and flawless execution
description.visual_style: Clean, efficient movements with minimal wasted motion
